SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc26
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc26.network

Interface VirtualView

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
VirtualRMIView, VirtualSocketView
public interface VirtualView extends Remote
This interface contains the methods that can be called from the server to be executed on the client.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    killProcess()
    Kills the client ending the game.
    void
    ping()
    Resets the timer in the client so the client knows the server is up.

  • Method Details

    • showMessage

      void showMessage(String message) throws RemoteException
      Print messages from the server to the client.
      Parameters:
      message - string to be displayed as information
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the remote method cannot be called

    • showError

      void showError(String message) throws RemoteException
      Notifies the clients about an error.
      Parameters:
      message - string to be displayed as an error
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the remote method cannot be called

    • updateClientState

      void updateClientState(ClientState clientState) throws RemoteException
      Updates the client's state (used during the game's initialization)
      Parameters:
      clientState - new client state
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the remote method cannot be called

    • setClientID

      void setClientID(String clientID) throws RemoteException
      Sets the client's id. Used only with socket implementation.
      Parameters:
      clientID - new client's id
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the remote method cannot be called

    • setGameController

      void setGameController() throws RemoteException
      Sets the game controller. Used only with socket implementation.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the remote method cannot be called

    • updateCommonTable

      void updateCommonTable(SimplifiedCommonTable simplifiedCommonTable, String message) throws RemoteException
      Updates the client's common table by giving a simplified version of model's common table. It also displays a message with information about the update.
      Parameters:
      simplifiedCommonTable - updated common table
      message - updated message
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the remote method cannot be called

    • updateHand

      void updateHand(SimplifiedHand simplifiedHand, String message) throws RemoteException
      Updates the client's hand by giving a simplified version of model's one. It also displays a message with the information about the update.
      Parameters:
      simplifiedHand - updated hand
      message - updated message
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the remote method cannot be called
